name: Dulbert: The tale of a hero or an idiot
name_original: Dulbert: The tale of a hero or an idiot
description:
Dulbert: The tale of a hero or an idiot is a game developed by shimoari. It came out on 08-02-2020.
Dulbert: The tale of a hero or an idiot is available on PC. The game is sold via itch.io.
